text: David Anthony "Tony" Roberts (October 22, 1939 - February 7, 2025) was an American actor. He was known for his roles in six Woody Allen movies. His best known role was in Annie Hall. Roberts died of lung cancer at his New York City home, on February 7, 2025, at the age of 85. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1939 births Category:Actors from New York City Category:American movie actors Category:American voice actors Category:American stage actors Category:American television actors Category:2025 deaths Category:Deaths from lung cancer
title: Tony Roberts (actor)
